originalText.text:
I got my marriage-based Green Card with Lucy in record time, only 2 months.

I would like to express my deepest gratitude for Lucy's invaluable assistance in the process. Her dedication and expertise have made this journey smoother, and I am truly thankful for having her as my lawyer.

Fantastic service!
Thank you, Lucy, so much for a truly first-class service!

originalText.text:
I'm an artist. I got my self sponsored Green Card with Lucy in record time, 3 months, and she was great all along the process.
She's been super professional and responsive, she definitely knew what she was doing and she was super helpful at preparing my material and advising.
I would recommend her every time.
Thanks Lucy!

originalText.text: Lucy did an excellent Job with our immigration application. She's thorough, easily reachable, knowledgeable and a very pleasant person to work with. We were lucky to have her represent us!

text.text: Lucy did an excellent Job with our immigration application. She's thorough, easily reachable, knowledgeable and a very pleasant person to work with. We were lucky to have her represent us!

originalText.text:
Lucy is a professional lawyer but also she has been a tremendous support in the emotionally stressful and frustrating process that legal immigration is.
She is very knowledgeable and takes personal interest and responsibility in the case. My case was a EB-2 green card through consular process. I would highly recommend Lucy!
